system
Interface Destructible

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bomb, Boss, Enemy, Explosion, Ghost, LivingUnit, Player, SoftBlock
public interface Destructible

This is the Destructible interface class that has the method die. The user of this interface calls the die method which indicates that something in the game should be destroyed.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Brett Leighton, Leotard Niyonkuru, Marc-Andre Cataford, Mete Kemertas, Martin Zhang

Method Summary
 void die()
          Destroys an object in the game
 

Method Detail

die

Destroys an object in the game
